tool_description: Records and validates soil sample collection metadata including location, timing, and environmental conditions to ensure sample integrity and traceability.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier for the soil sample

collection_date.description: Date and time of sample collection

error_messages: Invalid sample ID: Provide a unique, non-empty sample identifier.
Invalid collection date: Use valid ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid GPS coordinates: Provide exactly two numbers [latitude, longitude] within valid ranges.
Invalid collection depth: Depth must be a positive number.
Invalid weather conditions: Use dry, moist, or wet.
Invalid soil temperature: Temperature must be between -20°F and 120°F.
usage: Record each sample with sample_id, collection_date, gps_coordinates, and collection_depth. Add weather_conditions and soil_temperature for better context.

quality_flags.description: Any quality concerns or special notes
